bibdata.title: IEEE Trial-Use Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)
Networking Services
IEEE Trial-Use Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) - Networking Services

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: WAVE networking services provides services to WAVE devices and systems. It represents roughly layers 3 and 4 of the OSI model and the IP, UDP, and TCP elements of the Internet model. The services provided include management and data services within WAVE devices.

WAVE Networking Services provides services to WAVE devices and systems. It represents roughly layers 3 and 4 of the OSI model and the IP, UDP, and TCP elements of the Internet model. The services provided include management and data services within WAVE devices.
